definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: They found themselves in a passive position under attack.
sentences.chinese: 他们发现自己处于被动挨打的局面。

sentences.english: The mistake is caused by the situation today, Sheng Maolin too late to regret.
sentences.chinese: 当年的误以为是造成了今天的局面，盛茂林追悔莫及。

sentences.english: He dealed with an embarrassed situation dexterously.
sentences.chinese: 他很巧妙地应付了一个尴尬局面。

sentences.english: We let the game slip away, a game that we were in a good position to win.
sentences.chinese: 我们浪费了大好局面，让胜利从眼前溜走。

sentences.english: We make a write offer for the house.
sentences.chinese: 我们对住宅作了局面发价。

sentences.english: Your mother will bawl you out when she sees this mess.
sentences.chinese: 当你母亲看到这混乱的局面时她会责骂你的。

sentences.english: In the end, it is less and less inflow .
sentences.chinese: 到最后，却是越来越不入流的局面。

sentences.english: Security forces were ordered out to control the situation in the city.
sentences.chinese: 保安部队奉命出动以控制市内的局面。

sentences.english: If not, are you doing anything to change that?
sentences.chinese: 如果不开心，你将做什么事来改变这一局面？

sentences.english: Cheng. He expects a shortage of TBR tires won't end any time soon.
sentences.chinese: 他预计TBR轮胎短缺的局面近期内不会结束。

sentences.english: After Ban Gu, Great Han Ode began to decline.
sentences.chinese: 汉大赋的兴盛局面难以为继，开始走向衰败。

sentences.english: If politics is taken out of the picture, the situation is win-win.
sentences.chinese: 如果撇开政治的影响，这可以使个双赢的局面。

sentences.english: She outlined three steps she says will help you neutralize bad mouthing competitors.
sentences.chinese: 她设计了三个步骤，帮助大家缓解恶性竞争的局面。

sentences.english: These issues will be prime movers in the currency markets as unrest expands.
sentences.chinese: 随着动荡局面加剧，这些问题将是汇市的主推手。

sentences.english: In the Qing dynasty, creation of women's poetry in Huizhou flourished.
sentences.chinese: 在清代，徽州女性诗词创作出现了较为繁荣的局面。

sentences.english: Eg. He says his friend is confident in turning the table.
sentences.chinese: 他说他的朋友很有信心扭转局面。

definition: to reverse/to turn around (an undesirable situation)/(mechanics) torsion
internal trouble and outside aggression (idiom); in a mess both domestically and abroad
